title: Mailmalade
description: Mailmalade 2.0 is a service for quickly build HTML emails without coding knowledge and export to your MailChimp / Campaign Monitor account, or download a .zip with all the files.Is based on a 3-step process: 1.- Upload your design (mobile + desktop version)2.- Crop and define sections and links.3.- Export your email (compatible with all major email clients)Long life to old-style emails based on a full-image layout ;)
